text:
Q: What were Amazon's consolidated net sales in 2024?
A: $637,959 million ($637.959 billion)

Q: What were Amazon's consolidated net sales in 2023?
A: $574,785 million ($574.785 billion)

Q: What was Amazon's net income in 2024?
A: $59,248 million ($59.248 billion)

Q: What was Amazon's net income in 2023?
A: $30,425 million ($30.425 billion)

Q: What was Amazon's operating income in 2024?
A: $68,593 million ($68.593 billion)

Q: What was Amazon's operating income in 2023?
A: $36,852 million ($36.852 billion)

Q: What were total operating expenses in 2024?
A: $569,366 million ($569.366 billion)

Q: What were total operating expenses in 2023?
A: $537,933 million ($537.933 billion)

Q: How much was cost of sales in 2024?
A: $395,533 million ($395.533 billion)

A: $(386) million (net income)

A: $8 million

Q: What was total non-operating income (expense) in 2024?
A: $21 million (income)

Q: What was total non-operating income (expense) in 2023?
A: $(705) million (expense)

Q: What was the provision for income taxes in 2024?
A: $(9,265) million

Q: What was the provision for income taxes in 2023?
A: $(1,374) million

Q: What was equity-method investment activity (net of tax) in 2024?
A: $(101) million

A: $5.66

Q: What was diluted EPS in 2024?
A: $5.53

A: North America 61%, International 22%, AWS 17%

Q: What were the 2024 year-over-year growth rates by segment?
A: North America +10%; International +9% (+10% ex-FX); AWS +19%

Q: How did foreign exchange affect 2024 net sales and operating income?
A: FX reduced net sales by $2.335 billion and operating income by $131 million (net), with operating expenses reduced by $2.466 billion

Q: What was “free cash flow less equipment finance leases and principal repayments of all other finance leases and financing obligations” in 2024?
A: $36,211 million

A: $125,778 million (2024) vs. $123,473 million (2023)

A: 10,667 million shares (par value $0.01)
